    level="1"

>
[Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6262) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 187 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=240)

**Prerequisites**
[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=5212)

</column>

---

You are particularly skilled at using a shield to protect yourself in combat. You gain the [Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=4772) fighter feat.

<title level="2">Bastion Dedication leads to...</title>
[Destructive Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=6265), [Disarming Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=6263), [Nimble Shield Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=6264), [Shield Salvation](/Feats.aspx?ID=6266)
name: Bastion Dedication
